original_text: The king shall mourn, and the prince shall be clothed with desolation, and the hands of the people of the land shall be troubled: I will do unto them after their way, and according to their deserts will I judge them; and they shall know that I am the Lord.
korean_text: 왕은 애통하고 고관은 놀람을 옷 입듯 하며 주민의 손은 떨리리라 내가 그 행위대로 그들에게 갚고 그 죄악대로 그들을 심판하리니 내가 여호와인 줄을 그들이 알리라

sentences.original_text: and the prince shall be clothed with desolation
and the hands of the people of the land shall be troubled
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅 백성의 손이 떨릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: I will do unto them after their way
and according to their deserts will I judge them
and they shall know that I am the Lord
